title: Maximum Length of Pair Chain
content:
You are given  pairs of numbers. In every pair, the first number is always smaller than the second number.


Now, we define a pair  can follow another pair  if and only if . Chain of pairs can be formed in this fashion. 


Given a set of pairs, find the length longest chain which can be formed. You needn't use up all the given pairs. You can select pairs in any order.
